code: @Override public void setBeanFactory(BeanFactory beanFactory) {     this.beanFactory = beanFactory. }

@Override public Object postProcessBeforeInitialization(Object bean, String beanName) throws BeansException {     if (bean instanceof LoadTimeWeaverAware) {         LoadTimeWeaver ltw = this.loadTimeWeaver.         if (ltw == null) {             Assert.state(this.beanFactory != null, "BeanFactory required if no LoadTimeWeaver explicitly specified").             ltw = this.beanFactory.getBean(ConfigurableApplicationContext.LOAD_TIME_WEAVER_BEAN_NAME, LoadTimeWeaver.class).         }         ((LoadTimeWeaverAware) bean).setLoadTimeWeaver(ltw).     }     return bean. }
@Override public Object postProcessAfterInitialization(Object bean, String name) {     return bean. }
